title: 85/371/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1985 amending Decision 81/888/EEC extending, as regards certain non-member countries, the periods relating to the checks on practices for the maintenance of varieties laid down in Council Directives 70/457/EEC and 70/458/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 8 July 1985
amending Decision 81/888/EEC extending, as regards certain non-member countries, the periods relating to the checks on practices for the maintenance of varieties laid down in Council Directives 70/457/EEC and 70/458/EEC
(85/371/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1 of Decision 81/888/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In paragraph 1,
'Australia' is deleted and
'30 June 1985' is replaced by '30 June 1988';
2. In paragraph 2,
'Australia' is deleted and
'30 June 1985' is replaced by '30 June 1988';
3. In paragraph 3, '1 January 1984' is replaced by '1 January 1986'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
